title: A discourse not altogether vnprofitable, nor vnpleasant for such as are desirous to know the situation and customes of forraine cities without trauelling to see them Containing a discourse of all those citties wherein doe flourish at this day priuiledged vniuersities. Written by Samuel Levvkenor Gentleman.
author: Lewkenor, Samuel.
publisher: Imprinted by I[ohn] W[indet] for Humfrey Hooper, and are to be sold at his shop in Chauncery lane, at the signe of the Beare,
